Is the Verus network limited in its scalability and ability to support a large number of user identities and applications?

No, the Verus network is designed to be highly scalable and can support an unlimited number of user identities and applications. This allows for fast access to an unlimited number of user identities and their unlimited Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF) indexable key-value database.
